body_html:
Hey @vinceyuan Sorry you are having so much trouble with TF Lite. It looks like you are seeing some conflict between the bazel setup and the dependencies used in the Makefile build.

You shouldn't need to run download_dependencies.sh if you are building with bazel.
body_text:
Hey @vinceyuan Sorry you are having so much trouble with TF Lite. It looks like you are seeing some conflict between the bazel setup and the dependencies used in the Makefile build.
You shouldn't need to run download_dependencies.sh if you are building with bazel.
body:
Hey @vinceyuan Sorry you are having so much trouble with TF Lite. It looks like you are seeing some conflict between the bazel setup and the dependencies used in the Makefile build.

You shouldn't need to run download_dependencies.sh if you are building with bazel.
